They Are Ever Near.--Those who labor for the good of others are working in union with the heavenly angels. They have their constant companionship, their unceasing ministry. Angels of light and power are ever near to protect, to comfort, to heal, to instruct, to inspire. The highest education, the truest culture, and the most exalted 
                                                                           111
service possible to human beings in this world are theirs. --Testimonies, vol. 6, pp. 307, 308. (1900)
